tweets.text:
Judging by social media it‚Äôs another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. üò¢ü§¢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

@Conservatives @BorisJohnson How about sorting the landfill out in Silverdale ST5 We are being gassed out in this day in age. We can‚Äôt open windows, like living in a gas chamber. Scary, serious incident going on here! Help us please! @StinkStopthe @itvnews @BBCBreaking @SkyNewsBreak @DailyMailUK @TheSun

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe üòî that's what breaks my heart even more. I feel hopeless and then I think about all the children that are suffering in these deplorable conditions. I am scared to think of the long-term impacts on their health, education, and more. I send my love to you and your family.

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 There are no punishments strong enough for them doing that , each and every director needs to be indvidually accountable and prosecuted . @RedIndustries2 have breached their duty of care to our community .
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It's bad mate.

@a_merrydew @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Sending you love and strength, I know it doesn't help.... it is just unbelievable. Those responsible need to experience this. I do not know how they sleep at night #stopthestink
People can't even eat their tea in own homes because of foul noxious poisonous and corrosive hydrogen sulphide fumes, sickening! @EnvAgencyMids #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Given that you know very well that the community will be holding their breaths (literally) for a update today, it‚Äôs bit disrespectful to stay silent @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink
@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids What are you scared of? Close the hellhole down! #StopTheStink #LandfillStillStinks #WalleysQuarry https://t.co/TfGM5nBKug

@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Newcastle stinks tonight. You‚Äôd better sort soon or in the meantime pay for more call handlers for your complaints line. So much for enforcement notice: it‚Äôs done nothing. What‚Äôs the point of the Environment Agency exactly? #stopthestink

2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today üëá and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids So the capping is not finished, what now? When are you going to punish @RedIndustries2 for poisoning kids!

You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

@Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @ShaunLintern The increase in tonnage was authorised retrospectively as @RedIndustries2 had already started tipping more waste than their permitted tonnage. @EnvAgency did not properly investigate or listen to objection of Silverdale Parish Counci. @EnvAgency are complicit in all of this mess

What @ClareDinnisEA doesn‚Äôt explain in her interviews is why @EnvAgency were so slow to react to the current crisis and that they increased the permitted waste tonnage to the landfill in Oct 2020 even though odour complaints were on the rise!Negligent! @ShaunLintern #stopthestink https://t.co/i7h920bJNu https://t.co/wPyRTkwcTz

tweets.text: The @EnvAgency can't even get an email address that works. Please call 0800 80 70 60 to report the stink. https://t.co/24igWAaWhv

@a_merrydew @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off ..2/2 anxiety is still bad wondering how bad it‚Äôs getting in my little boys room. Sleep torture is right, a bad stretch starts making me crazy, have sent some really unbalanced emails in the middle of the night before! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@maricaoneill @a_merrydew @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off This is the huge problem isn‚Äôt it, the community have followed the law&procedures&been in touch with the government themselves yet have been let down at every turn & have been told categorically by @ClareDinnisEA she‚Äôs scared of doing anything to upset the operator! @Cap_it_off

@fayedavies It got into my home again about 20 mins ago. I feel trapped & hopeless. I'm home alone & crying on my sofa. I feel embarrassed tweeting this but it's not me that should be embarrassed. It's the @EnvAgency, @EnvAgencyMids, and @RedIndustries2 who should hang their heads in shame.
This is why we need to go higher than @EnvAgency ! Ineffective , inept & defensive of their own mistakes @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #stillstinks https://t.co/PQFr5Vikjd

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off My family live 3 hours away so I can't go stay with them üòî I hope you're OK, though sadly I suspect you're not given how strong the hydrogen sulfide odour is again tonight xx

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

@eutrophic9 @EllieChowns @EnvAgency Unaware that dumping waste next to a river means the waste ends up in the river? That‚Äôs a nice delusion

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.
